participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Curious and playful, always eager to explore new things.
participant_1.background: i like to eat chocolate candy. when i grow up i want to be a dog. i like to talk but people have a hard time understanding. i'm four years old.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: Creative and adventurous, with a flair for the unconventional.
participant_2.background: i dye my hair every three months. my dream in life is to work from home. i have an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. i went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it.
